polytech.devint.controller.input

Class SwingInputConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • polytech.devint.controller.input.SwingInputConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IConfiguration

    public class SwingInputConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
implements IConfiguration
    Represent a configuration of inputs in the current environment. It define the key binding.
    Author:
    Loris Friedel

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SwingInputConfiguration()
      Create an empty input configuration

      • unbind

        public void unbind(java.lang.Integer keyCode)
        Remove a key binding in all registered controls. Warning : all linked event are removed. After that, the given key code triggers no event.
        Parameters:
        keyCode - Key code of the key to remove its binding

      • unbind

        public void unbind(java.lang.Class<? extends Event> event)
        Remove all the binding for the given event i.e. this event couldn't be called anymore in the all controls map.
        Parameters:
        event - Event(s) that should now be bind anymore.
